+ Key Bindings

Many of the key bindings defined below may be changed, see ChangingKeyBindings.

Please note: These bindings have been developed for use on MsWindows.
On other Operating Systems like [Apple OSX] or Linux there may be differences.
See KeyBindingsOnLinuxAndOsx.


++ TextFormatting
	* [Ctrl-B]          bold
	* [Ctrl-I]          italic

++ WikiHeaders
	* [Ctrl-Alt-H]      heading

++ Navigate
	* [Ctrl-L]          activate link
	* [Ctrl-Alt-L]      activate WikiWord in a new tab

++ SearchingTheWiki
	* [Ctrl-F]          start IncrementalSearch, perform next search
	* [F3]              start IncrementalSearch, perform next search
	* [Ctrl-Alt-F]      search for words within the wiki

++ [History]
	* [Ctrl-H]          view [history]
	* [Ctrl-Alt-Up]     view [history], select -1
	* [Ctrl-Alt-Down]   view [history], select +1
	* [Ctrl-Alt-Left]   go back in [history]
	* [Ctrl-Alt-Right]  go forward in [history]

++ WikiWords
	* [Ctrl-O]          search for and open WikiWord
	* [Ctrl-S]          save current WikiWord
	* [Ctrl-R]          search and replace within current WikiWord 
	* [Ctrl-Alt-R]      rename the current WikiWord
	* [Ctrl-D]          delete the current WikiWord, including all content for that word
	* [Ctrl-Up]         view parents of current WikiWord
	* [Ctrl-Down]       view children of current WikiWord
	* [Ctrl-Shift-Up]   view [parentless nodes]

++ View
	* [Ctrl-Shift-A]    show [Edit mode] of current WikiTextEditorTab
	* [Ctrl-Shift-S]    show [Preview mode] of current WikiTextEditorTab
	* [Ctrl-Shift-Space]toggle between [Edit mode] and [Preview mode] of current tab

	* [Ctrl-T]          hide/show the ["Tree" window]
	* [F6]              cycle through windows
	* [Ctrl-Tab]        switch between WikiTextEditorTabs

++ Zoom
	* [Ctrl-+]          zoom in
	* [Ctrl--]          zoom out

++ WikiBookmarks
	* [Ctrl-Alt-B]      add a bookmark
	* [Ctrl-Shift-B]    goto bookmark
 
++ Commands
	* [Ctrl-W]          rewrap text at position
	* [Ctrl-E]          eval scripts

++ Wiki
	* [Ctrl-N]          new Wiki
	* [Ctrl-Alt-O]      open wiki

++ Insert
	* [Ctrl-Alt-D]      Insert current date/time
